item.description: The nubia Red Magic 5G was introduced last month and we even got to review the phone. Now the 144Hz screen phone is finally ready to begin its global journey.

item.title: من هو الفنان العماني سعود الدرمكي الذي أحزن سلطنة عمان برحيله؟
item.description: الدبور – عم الحزن في مواقع التواصل الإجتماعي صباح اليوم في سلطنة عمان، مع إعلان نبأ وفاة الفنان العماني سعود الدرمكي عن عمر يناهز الـ70 عامًا. ولكن من هو الفنان العماني سعودي الدرمكي وماذا يشكل لجيل كامل من العمانيين الذي عاصروه ومن اتى بعدهم أيضا؟ يعتبر الراحل ” الدرمكي” واحداً من الفنانين الذين أغنوا الدراما العمانية بكثير من الأعمال المميزة التي ألتصقت بذاكرة الإنسان العماني كونها عكست الحياة الطبيعية لهذا المجتمع، وهو المحب لوطنه وقيادته.

item.title: It’s Official—the 2020 Tour de France Has Been Postponed
item.description: Race organizer Amaury Sport Organisation announced on Tuesday that the 2020 Tour de France will be postponed. Earlier on Tuesday, French president Emmanuel Macron canceled all large public events until mid-July.

item.title: Christian Nodal ¿Quién es y por qué es tendencia en redes sociales?

item.title: Walt Disney Enters New $5 Billion Credit Agreement For Coronavirus Cushion, Follows $6 Billion Debt Sale Last Month
item.description: Walt Disney said Monday it’s entered into a new $5 billion, one-year credit agreement. That follows $6 billion the company raised last month with a sale of debt securities. The current agreement matures in April of 2021 and could be extended for a year.

item.description: Γιατί και οι δύο κυρίες επέλεξαν το πράσινο χρώμα και τι συμβολίζει; Κάθε χρόνο η Πρώτη Κυρία των ΗΠΑ υποδέχεται στον Λευκό Οίκο παιδάκια για το καθιερωμένο Easter Egg Roll, κατά το οποίο ψάχνουν πασχαλινά αυγά που είναι κρυμμένα στην έπαυλη και στη συνέχεια τους διαβάζει παραμύθια.

item.title: Dziś Święto Chrztu Polski. 1054 lata temu Polska stała się państwem chrześcijańskim
item.description: Do chrztu Polski doszło w 966 r. Wtedy to książę Mieszko I został katolikiem, a Polska stała się państwem chrześcijańskim uznawanym przez swoich sąsiadów. Decyzja ta wpisała Polskę w krąg cywilizacji łacińskiej i jest uważana za jedno z najważniejszych wydarzeń w historii naszego kraju.

item.title: Hovsångerskan Kerstin Meyer död

item.title: أحداث الأميرية: مقتل 7 مسلحين وضابط مصري في تبادل لإطلاق النار شرقي القاهرة
item.description: مصدر الصورة AFP أعلنت وزارة الداخلية المصرية، مساء الثلاثاء، مقتل سبعة “عناصر إرهابية” في منطقة الأميرية، شرق القاهرة، كانوا يستعدون لتنفيذ “عمليات إرهابية” بالتزامن مع أعياد المسيحيين في مصر. وقالت الوزارة، في بيان رسمي، إن الاشتباكات مع تلك العناصر أسفرت عن “استشهاد” المقدم محمد الحوفي، من الأمن الوطني، وإصابة ضابط آخر وفردين من الشرطة.

item.title: “No sé cómo no se cansan”: Karla Panini se defendió de la nueva ola de ataques en Twitter

item.title: Hong Kong pandas 'get it on' under lockdown after 10 years of indifference
item.description: Ying Ying and Le Le, giant pandas at Ocean Park in Hong-Kong, mated naturally for the first time in a decade of trying, two months after the theme park closed its doors to the public over coronavirus.

item.description: BORIS Johnson put the UK on lockdown with drastic measures on March 23 in the fight against the coronavirus outbreak. Stand-in PM Dominic Raab is set to announce on Thursday, April 16, that the country’s restrictions will stay in place until at least May 7.

item.title: How Ellen DeGeneres' Historic Coming-Out Episode Changed Television
item.description: When Ellen Morgan, the character Ellen DeGeneres played on her sitcom Ellen, came out as gay on the show’s April 30, 1997, episode, it sent shockwaves through the television industry. Up to that point, only a handful of gay characters had been seen on television, and none of these were series leads.

item.title: Student-led petition over the Canada Emergency Response Benefit gains traction
item.description: SUDBURY – During this unprecedented time of COVID-19, millions of Canadians will be turning to the Canada Emergency Response Benefit for help and post-secondary students say they should qualify. An online petition called #Don’tForgetStudents is calling on Ottawa to amend the government financial assistance program and has already garnered more than 34,000 signatures as of Tuesday morning.

item.title: “Uma cientista de corpo inteiro” que fazia “grandes perguntas”: as reacções à morte de Maria de Sousa
item.description: “Estava sempre preocupada com a próxima questão” No meio desta grande tristeza, é importante salientar que a Maria de Sousa deixou um imenso legado não apenas científico, mas também para aquilo que são hoje em Portugal e pelo mundo as gerações de cientistas, que, de uma maneira directa ou indirecta, são inspiradas por aquilo que ela fez.

De longues discussions, dont on ne peut préjuger de la conclusion… Dans l’équation, d’abord et avant tout, les statistiques.

item.title: حل امتحان الرياضيات للصف الأول الثانوى 2020 كامل
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); تسريب امتحان الرياضيات للصف الاول الثانوي 2020 ولكن احذر أسوة بكل عام خلال الأعوام القليلة الماضية، تقوم صفحات في مواقع التواصل الاجتماعي فيسبوك، بنشر تسريب امتحان الرياضيات للصف الاول الثانوي 2020 وذلك بعد وقت من الإعلان عن إلغاء الامتحانات في لجان الامتحانات كما هو العادة، وتم إقرار الامتحانات بشكل مختلف هذا العام لكل الصفوف أبرزها امتحانات الصفوف الثانوية هذا العام التي ستكون إلكترونية باستخدام التابلت وتم الامتحان التجريبي قبل أيام.

item.title: Comedian Mulamwa hangs up his boots cites Cyber Bullying
item.description: 6 SHARES Share Tweet Comedian Mulamwa has hung up his boots in the comedy industry s=citing online bullying as his main reason. item.title: Wizz Air Cuts 1,000 Members Of Staff
item.description: Advertisement: Wizz Air has just announced that it will be axing 1,000 jobs due to the current COVID-19 pandemic. Central Europe’s largest low-cost airline said that it was making 19% of its workforce redundant following a 97% fall in operations.

item.description: In India, where more than 250 million children have been affected by school closures, Worldreader is working with educational agencies and telecommunications companies to alert parents to its free e-reading service through WhatsApp and SMS group messages.

item.title: Kamerleden 50Plus zeggen vertrouwen op in voorzitter Geert Dales
item.description: Met uitzondering van fractievoorzitter Henk Krol hebben alle Eerste en Tweede Kamerleden van 50Plus alsmede partijoprichter Jan Nagel het vertrouwen opgezegd in voorzitter Geert Dales. Dat hebben de dissidente Kamerleden dinsdag in een persbericht laten weten.

item.title: Giulio Tarro: “Coronavirus non è Ebola, il vaccino non serve. Sanità in crisi per colpa di chi ha dimezzato le terapie intensive” – Business Insider Italia
item.description: L’attesa per un vaccino contro il coronavirus potrebbe essere inutile: “Se il virus ha come sembra una variante cinese e una padana, sarà complicato averne uno che funziona in entrambi i casi esattamente come avviene per i vaccini antinfluenzali che non coprono tutto”.

item.title: ‘We’re not there yet’: Anthony Fauci warns about reopening economy
item.description: White House coronavirus task force member Dr. Anthony Fauci on Tuesday pushed back on President Trump’s optimistic projection of soon reopening the nation’s economy — saying the US still lacks enough coronavirus testing materials and tracing procedures to make that possible.

item.title: New study shows coronavirus travels on shoes
item.description: JACKSONVILLE, Fla. – A new study out of Wuhan, China found that the coronavirus is widely distributed on the floors of hospitals treating COVID-19 patients. While concentrations of the virus were highest in ICU wards, general wards (even those not treating coronavirus patients) showed positive testing results too.

item.title: MasterChef viewers swoon over fan favourite Reynold Poernomo
item.description: Reynold Poernomo first appeared on MasterChef back in 2015. And it seems the dessert king and his ‘Zen vibes’ are a welcome return to the current series, with viewers flocking to Twitter to swoon over the 26-year-old chef.

item.title: What is a zonkey? Zebra gives birth to rare animal after mating with donkey
item.description: It’s a zonkey! That was the birth announcement made in an April 8 press release by the Sheldrick Wildlife Trust, a charity animal rescue and rehabilitation organization in Kenya. But what is a zonkey and how did it come to be?

item.description: “To meet the moment, the Democratic Party will have to be bold,” Mr. Obama said. “I could not be prouder of the incredible progress that we made together during my presidency.

item.title: Island Lockdown to continue until at least April 23
item.description: Rules on social distancing will be in place until at least April 23 and the Island’s borders will be closed for another month. The Island’s Health and Social Care Minister David Ashford confirmed the news in afternoon’s Tynwald sitting.

item.title: King Power shifts focus to online
item.description: King Power shifts focus to online Duty-free retail giant King Power is pivoting to e-commerce in response to the pandemic, with a new sales campaign and free shipping to attract online shoppers.

item.title: 'Duna': Oscar Isaac, Zendaya e Timothée Chalamet aparecem em primeiras imagens
item.description: RIO - Um dos lançamentos mais aguardados pelos fãs de ficção científica em 2020, o filme “Duna” teve suas primeiras imagens divulgadas nesta terça-feira. Com direção de Denis Villeneuve (“A chegada”, “Blade Runner 2049”), o longa é uma adaptação do clássico de Frank Herbert, considerado o livro de sci-fi mais vendido de todos os tempos.

item.title: One third of NHS staff tested in the UK have coronavirus
item.description: London (CNN) A third of NHS staff and key workers who have been tested for coronavirus in the UK have returned positive results, new British government data shows. According to figures released Monday, 16,888 people who fall into the category of “key workers and their households,” and who have shown symptoms or live with symptomatic people, have been tested.

item.title: ACCEDE AQUÍ al padrón Ingreso Solidario 160.000 pesos DNP: pasos de cobros del subsidio del Gobierno de Colombia
item.description: Este martes 14 de abril, un día más para realizar tu cobro de este subsidio monetario (de 160.000 pesos colombianos) del Gobierno de Iván Duque, quien ordenó la extensión de cuarentena hasta el 26 de abril, a fin de controlar la propagación del coronavirus (COVID-19).

item.description: Doda i Emil Stępień świętują drugą rocznicę ślubu. Para pobrała się 14 kwietnia 2018 roku w hiszpańskiej Marbelli. Ceremonia, tak jak i związek pary, utrzymywane były w sekrecie. Doda i Emil Stępień obchodzą dzisiaj, 14 kwietnia, drugą rocznicę ślubu.

item.title: Rachel Riley and Rabbi Sacks back virtual March of the Living project
item.description: Countdown presenter Rachel Riley and former chief rabbi Lord Jonathan Sacks were among the A-listers to back an online Holocaust remembrance project led by March of the Living. item.title: Former Italy international Gianluca Vialli given all-clear from pancreatic cancer
item.description: (CNN) Former Italy striker Gianluca Vialli has been given the all-clear from pancreatic cancer, his old club Chelsea says. Vialli, who played for Sampdoria, Juventus and Chelsea before taking on a player manager role with the Blues in 1998, enjoyed a decorated club career and represented his country more than 50 times.

item.title: Νέα μέτρα για τις μετακινήσεις το Πάσχα: Σκέψεις για απαγόρευση κυκλοφορίας αυτοκινήτων
item.description: Στην κυβέρνηση εξετάζουν το σενάριο να απαγορευτεί η μετακίνηση με αυτοκίνητα το Μεγάλη Σάββατο και την Κυριακή το Πάσχα. Λίγα 24ωρα πριν Πάσχα, οι διαβουλεύσεις στην κυβέρνηση φαίνεται εξετάζουν όλα τα σενάρια που υπάρχουν στο τραπέζι για την αποφυγή μεγάλων συγκεντρώσεων στα σπίτια, ακόμη και την απαγόρευση κυκλοφορίας αυτοκινήτων.

item.title: Já há novas datas para os exames nacionais do secundário
item.description: O 3º período iniciou-se esta terça-feira para 1,4 milhões de alunos que terão agora de aprender à distância. Há novas regras de avaliação e datas para realizar os exames nacionais que são exigidos pelos diferentes cursos do ensino superior.

item.title: Chernobyl fire: rain has helped extinguish flames, says Ukraine
item.description: Open flames burning in Chernobyl’s exclusion zone have been extinguished after rain fell in the region north of Kyiv early on Tuesday morning, Ukraine’s emergency service has said, although activists monitoring the wildfires complained they had been barred from entering the area.

item.title: Terceiro período escolar arranca com aulas à distância
item.description: As escolas estão encerradas desde 16 de março, quando o Governo decidiu suspender todas as atividades letivas presenciais, e os alunos trocaram a sala de aula por um espaço na sua casa e passaram a ter aulas “online” e a receber os trabalhos por “e-mail” ou pelo correio.

item.title: Sportkedjan tvingas att ansöka om rekonstruktion
item.description: I dag har Intersport Sverige lämnat in en ansökan om företagsrekonstruktion till Göteborgs tingsrätt. ”Bolaget har i grunden en sund underliggande verksamhet och frisk kärna men har, precis som många andra i branschen, drabbats hårt av den senaste tidens minskade handel i kölvattnet av Coronakrisen vilket lett till tillfälliga betalningssvårigheter och en ohållbar kostnadskostym framåt”, skriver man i ett utskick i dag.

item.title: Desde hoy, multas para quienes incumplan con ‘pico y género’ en Bogotá
item.description: Entre críticas y aplausos, el ‘pico y género’ decretado por la alcaldesa Claudia López, con el cual se busca reducir al máximo la población que circula en las calles de Bogotá, entrará en vigencia hoy de manera obligatoria y quienes incumplan la medida se exponen a fuertes sanciones económicas.

item.title: Coreia do Norte sem coronavírus. Mito ou realidade?
item.description: A Coreia do Norte insiste que não tem qualquer caso do novo coronavírus, mas essa afirmação é recebida com ceticismo, numa altura em que o covid-19 se aproxima dos dois milhões de casos e já causou mais de 115 mil mortes em todo o mundo.

item.title: Meet Jeff Lowe’s Nanny, the Most Googleable Star From ‘Tiger King’
item.description: Those who have seen Netflix’s Tiger King: Murder, Mayhem and Madness know that the most Googable star isn’t Joe Exotic or Carole Baskin, but Jeff Lowe’s nanny. Netflix’s Tiger King—which followed the rise and fall of Joe Exotic, the owner of Oklahoma’s Greater Wynnewood Exotic Animal Park—released its eighth and final episode on Sunday, April 12.

item.title: Opinion | What to Do With Tara Reade’s Allegation Against Joe Biden?
item.description: It would be easier to know what to do with Tara Reade’s accusation that Joe Biden sexually assaulted her if her tale were more solid, or if it were less.

item.title: ההתאחדות לכדורגל הודיעה על סיום העונה בליגות א-ג
item.description: הקבוצות שמדורגות במקום הראשון בכל הליגות, מלבד הליגות המקצועניות, יוכתרו כאלופות ההתאחדות לכדורגל הודיעה כי עונת המשחקים בכל הליגות, מלבד הליגות המקצועניות, תסתיים באופן מידי, עם אישור החלטה זו. משחקי גביע המדינה לנשים/נוער/נערים/נערות/ילדים/ילדות וטרום ילדים לא יושלמו בעונת המשחקים 2019/20.

item.title: The first gaming laptops with AMD's killer new Ryzen CPUs are starting to go on sale
item.description: Barring a deal that is just too good to pass up, the last few weeks have not been a great time to be in the market for a gaming laptop, because both AMD and Intel have new mobile CPUs on the horizon.

item.title: La excepción que se añadió al decreto de ampliación de la cuarentena
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Lo que debe saber del decreto 457 del 2020 La medida empezará a regir desde las 00:00 horas del próximo miércoles y se extenderá hasta el 13 de abril.

item.title: Zoom security: Your meetings will be safe and secure if you do these 10 things
item.description: As the novel coronavirus spread across the globe, the business landscape was forced to make a number of swift changes. Lockdowns and social isolation measures, restricted travel, and the closure of firms not considered to be “essential” services proved to be a catalyst for home working, of which many of us were woefully unprepared to accommodate.

item.title: خطوات إصدار تصريح التنقل للمنشات المرخصة من 'الغذاء والدواء'
item.description: الرياض (صدى): كشفت الهيئة العامة للغذاء والدواء، عن آلية إصدار تصريح التنقل خلال فترة منع التجول للمنشات المرخصة من الهيئة. وتأتي الخطوات كالتالي: • يقوم مقدم الطلب بالدخول على الرابط الإلكتروني هنا .

item.title: ‘The Baker and the Beauty’ Recap: Season 1, Episode 1 Premiere on ABC
item.description: RELATED STORIES ABC to Host Disney Family Singalong With Christina Aguilera, John Stamos, Kristin Chenoweth and Many More ABC to Host Disney Family Singalong With Christina Aguilera, John Stamos, Kristin Chenoweth and Many More ABC to Honor Garry Marshall With Primetime Special — Watch Promo

item.title: Why an old TB vaccine is getting attention in the fight against Covid-19
item.description: In the desperate search for ammunition to fend off the Covid-19 pandemic, a decades-old tuberculosis vaccine, given in huge numbers around the world, is gaining newfound attention. Researchers in Australia and the Netherlands are testing the idea that the vaccine, known as BCG — short for bacille Calmette-Guérin — could have broad power to boost the immune system against the novel coronavirus.

item.title: Podnikání Slovákové je oficiálně rizikové. Má na krku ČOI i policii, její gely nedostal nikdo
item.description: Brněnská vítězka reality show Hotel Paradise Nela Slováková (30), která se rozhodla vydělávat si peníze jako majitelka e-shopu a také jako chodící reklama na Instagramu, kde propaguje vše možné od sítě automyček až po čokoládové krémy, má v době koronavirové zaděláno na velké nepříjemnosti.

item.title: The Simpsons season 4 episode 21 : Predict the Coronavirus?
item.description: Did the Simpsons predict Coronavirus? Did the Simpsons Predict the Coronavirus? First predicting President Trump and now this?! See the receipts here! Everyone is talking about the Coronavirus these last few weeks…but were the Simpsons were talking about it 27 years ago?

item.title: Altered Carbon Season 1 Recap / Review
item.description: One of the most intriguing sci-fi dramas of recent years is Netflix’s ‘Altered Carbon’. Based on Richard Morgan’s book of the same name, it is set in a futuristic world where humans have found a way to cheat death.
